LanguageData.Epinephrine.label: epinephrine autoinjector
LanguageData.Epinephrine.description: An epinephrine autoinjector (or adrenaline autoinjector) is a medical device for injecting a measured dose or doses of epinephrine (adrenaline) by means of autoinjector technology.
LanguageData.Morphine.label: morphine autoinjector
